metadata.title: A stochastic SIR epidemic model with Lévy jump and media coverage

body_text.section: Assumption (H1) ::: Introduction

body_text.text: This assumption means that the intensities of Lévy noises are not infinite.
body_text.section: Remark 1 ::: Introduction

body_text.text: The outline of this paper is as follows. In Sect. 2, a unique positive solution for system (1.4) is obtained. The conditions are derived for the extinction and persistence in the mean of diseases. The threshold behavior is obtained and discussed. In Sect. 3, some numerical simulations are presented to verify our theoretical results of system (1.4).
